name: Hunt-or-Haunt
description:
Hunt-or-Haunt is a 6 to 12 player online game where two teams,Huntsmen and Haunts, face-off in pandemonius battles of elimination!

As Hunters combine forces to uncover and dispatch their ghostly foes, Haunts use their stealth and trickery to divide and conquer.



The first team to fully eliminate the other wins, but it won’t be so easy!


Hunters’ spells are limited and require judicious timing, and while teams of Haunts have more tricks at their disposal, they begin each round outnumbered.



Hunters can use their magic to free captured allies and restore their mana at key locations, but Haunts can sabotage restoration points and move captured hunters.

Through strategic use of the map and your abilities, you can bait opponents into ambushes, pull-off narrow getaways, and turn the tide of battle in your favor!

Will the Hunters exorcise their spectral nemeses, or will the hunters become the haunted?
